name: Fuma Kotaro went to Akechi Mitsuhide.
description:
Kotaro Fuma infiltrates the warlords to find clues to kill the "dragon" that is brainwashing them and leading them to destroy the world.
The person he infiltrated was Mitsuhide Akechi.

He is a warlord in the service of Oda Nobunaga, a man of immense power.
The warlords who had been brainwashed by the dragon had bloodshot eyes and gray skin.
Kotaro thought that Mitsuhide Akechi was also experiencing the same symptoms.

Hired by Mitsuhide as a ninja, Kotaro performed numerous espionage and assassination missions.

While working for Mitsuhide, Kotaro had a question that came to mind.

The brainwashed warlords had forgotten their reason and started to run rampant, attacking the people of the city, but Mitsuhide seemed to have his reason intact.
He is kind and humane to the common people.

He hasn't been brainwashed.

Kotaro becomes friends with Mitsuhide and learns of Mitsuhide's plan to assassinate Oda Nobunaga.

You can reading more storys on our WEB site [tezosninjas.xyz]
